headline: Manchester City Puts Smart Water Tech in Play on the Pitch
summary: WASHINGTON, May 22, 2025--Manchester City Football Club is using data and analytics for more than performance on the pitch. A champion of water sustainability, the Club is taking its commitment to the next level – introducing digital solutions from its official water technology partner, Xylem (NYSE: XYL), to help capture and reuse rainwater more efficiently.
